title: The #DailyMemeWars lives
author: VD
content_html: Twitter can suspend me indefinitely, but they can’t stop the signal. Dozens of today’s Meme of the Day are already being tweeted. When they shut us down, we route around. It’s not as if we didn’t anticipate the thought police. Sign up for the mailing list and join the #DailyMemeWars.
content_text:
Twitter can suspend me indefinitely, but they can’t stop the signal. Dozens of today’s Meme of the Day are already being tweeted. When they shut us down, we route around. It’s not as if we didn’t anticipate the thought police.
Sign up for the mailing list
and join the
#DailyMemeWars
.
